headline: Did Raised Guidance on Strong Product Demand Just Shift Axon Enterprise's (AXON) Investment Narrative?
summary: Axon Enterprise recently reported second-quarter 2025 adjusted earnings and revenue that exceeded estimates, powered by robust demand for its TASER 10, Axon Body 4, counter-drone equipment, and growth in premium software solutions. Despite raising its 2025 revenue guidance to US$2.65–2.73 billion, reflecting about 29% annual growth at the midpoint, analyst estimates have been trending downward and the stock has faced meaningful pressure since its last quarterly report. We'll examine how...
